title: Agilysys to be Showcased at 'Integrated Resort Experience at G2E'Travelandtourworld.com
text:
Agilysys to be Showcased at ‘Integrated Resort Experience at G2E’ Published on : Tuesday, September 29, 2015
Agilysys, Inc. a leading global provider of next-generation hospitality software solutions and services, has announced that its solutions will be showcased at this year’s ‘Integrated Resort Experience at G2E,’ which will take place at the Global Gaming Expo inside the Sands Convention Center in Las Vegas, Sept. 29 – Oct. 1. The company will demonstrate the Lodging Management System (LMS®) property management solution, the InfoGenesis® Flex mobile point-of-sale system and the rGuest® Buy self-service kiosk solution.
The Integrated Resort Experience is an innovative and interactive platform that presents leading non-gaming technology, products and services as guests would experience them in a gaming-resort setting. The event features amenities that complement the casino-gaming floor, such as dining, live entertainment, guestroom concepts and spa offerings. The event will connect casino properties with solutions that entice visitors, increase spending and lengthen stay.
LMS will be featured at the Integrated Resort Experience’s hotel registration desk, InfoGenesis Flex will be featured at the Integrated Resort Experience’s bar, and rGuest Buy will be showcased at the Integrated Resort Experience’s INDULGE section, where attendees can use the kiosk solution to order ice cream selections online and then pick up their orders at the Agilysys G2E booth. Agilysys is the only PMS and POS vendor exhibiting at this year’s Integrated Resort Experience.
Recognized as one of the hospitality industry’s premier property management solutions, Agilysys LMS provides automation for every aspect of hotel operations, including reservations and credit card processing, accounting and housekeeping, sales and catering, activities scheduling, food and beverage sales, online reservations, remote check-in, spa scheduling and more. Leading global gaming properties rely on LMS’s flexibility and ease of use to increase productivity, maximize revenue per guest and ensure repeat business.
InfoGenesis Flex is an Agilysys mobility solution built around the industry-leading InfoGenesis POS system. It offers full point-of-sale functionality delivered on state-of-the-art tablets, providing a flexible and feature-rich mobile experience for restaurant and foodservice operations. The solution is designed to keep revenue flowing and guests satisfied in the most demanding high-volume environments, and its powerful offline capabilities ensure uninterrupted performance, even when Wi-Fi connectivity is inconsistent. Managers also have access to all InfoGenesis tools while on the floor, so they can oversee operations ‘on-the-go’ and make immediate service adjustments as demand ebbs and flows.
rGuest Buy is the Agilysys self-service kiosk solution that integrates with InfoGenesis to transform point-of-sale business. With rGuest Buy, guests can select menu items, process credit card payments and print receipts ─ all using a simple interface. The solution leverages existing InfoGenesis menus and processes payments through rGuest Pay, the industry’s leading point-to-point encrypted PCI-validated gateway with EMV payment devices. Key features of rGuest Buy include real-time menu updates, menu categories and item modifiers, advanced analytics, kitchen workflow management, digital order status display, upsell and recommendations, loyalty management and past order history. Kiosks can be placed anywhere on property to increase guest convenience and reduce staff demand.
“We are excited about participating in the Integrated Resort Experience,” said Jim Walker, vice president of sales and marketing at Agilysys. “There’s nothing quite like seeing technology work in a real-life setting, and this interactive platform gives gaming customers the unique ability to do that. Our LMS, InfoGenesis Flex and rGuest Buy solutions not only increase efficiency and streamline overall operations, but also offer customers the ability to capitalize on revenue opportunities and enhance guest service. Our mission is to provide technology that addresses the entire guest lifecycle so that properties can create lasting connections with guests that engender loyalty and encourage repeat business.”
Visit Agilysys at G2E in Las Vegas at the Integrated Resort Experience and at Booth #3602.
